update.public_update_changelog:
• Fixes for various crashing issues in the Android Downloader
• A fix for news & DLC caching for mac builds whilst removing support for the updater
• Fixes for various filesystem errors, resulting in missing image data
• Several other small bugfixes and improvements
update.supporter_update_changelog:
• Fixes for various crashing issues in the Android Downloader
• A fix for news & DLC caching for mac builds whilst removing support for the updater
• Fixes for various filesystem errors, resulting in missing image data
• Several other small bugfixes and improvements

news.title: Update 1.10 - Releases October 4th!
news.text:
Version 1.10 is releasing on October 4th to all $5+ supporters! 
 
This update includes: 
    • 14,000 words (approximately 1 Hour of additional gameplay) 
    • 8 New Events (2 Main Events, 6 Character Events) 
    • New Animations, Invite Options & Photo Messages 
    • A complete GUI overhaul

news.title: 'Another World' - 2-Year Anniversary!
news.text: I seriously cannot thank everyone enough for the support I have received over the past 365 days of development. If you want to read me waffle about it all, check the posts linked below!

news.title: 600 Discord Members!
news.text:
We've reached a grand total of 600 Members over on the Discord - and to celebrate, we voted for a character to receieve a lewd photoshoot! 

Our winner was Rin - they've got their photoshoot 'R-9000 - Unfit to Pilot' out on the Discord now!

Consider joining to access to this photoshoot, and all older ones!

news.title: 'Another World' OST on YouTube!
news.text:
Due to popular demand, the official 'Another World' soundtrack is available on Youtube! 

I'll be adding tracks frequently to the channel to share all of the talent that's been accumulated for the soundtrack to this game. Be sure to check it out if you're interested!
